## AbstractInstanceType type

Abstract classes don't support the builtin `InstanceType` helper. This is an alternative which allows us to pull out the type of the prototype.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AbstractInstanceType<GConstructor extends {
    prototype: any;
}> = GConstructor['prototype'];
```
